website_summaries.verdict: The low-top Osiris D3 2001 is among the classic skate shoes that deliver excellent comfort, letting you experience a walk on the clouds. It is loaded with techs that ensure not only comfort but also performance. The Osiris D3 2001 carries an eye-catching design without compromising the comfort and durability that skateboarders need to perform kicks and flips. Unique style, comfort, performance, and durability are what you get from this shoe at an affordable rate.
pros: A lot of wearers have testified that the Osiris D3 2001 delivers supreme comfort
This iteration is among the Osiris shoes that are made of premium quality providing durability, according to many purchasers
Several customers are astonished by the sneaker’s cute and awesome design
Most of the reviewers are impressed and considers the low-top Osiris D3 2001 as the coolest skate shoe
This sneaker has a design that brings a nostalgic vibe, as per some buyers
Plenty of skateboarders are amazed at how the shoes offer excellent protection
It provides flexibility while on the board, according to a few skaters
Some consumers have stated that the D3 2001 from Osiris gives excellent value for their money
cons: A few have mentioned that the Osiris D3 2001 fits tight around the toe area, so sizing a half up is suggested
The sneaker is a bit bulky, according to some users

customer_reviews.title: Different from old models
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes but quality wasn’t looking good when I received the shoes. It wasn’t quite comfortable as the old models.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Miles

customer_reviews.title: D3 what more needs to be said!
customer_reviews.text: I have had over 10 pair of these since they came out in 2001. They are the most comfortable shoe but this time around the front seam where the toe and tongue and sides meet across the top of your toes you can feel it. Comparing my 2yr old pair and the new one it seems like there is one seam holding everthing on new ones and 2 seams so that it would be flush on the old pair.... looking at the detail they seem more rushed than the last many pairs. But im hopeful the seam can flatten down some over time with wear and the fabric relaxes
customer_reviews.author: Gary McCann

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Osiris D3 is a great shoe I had a black pair of these during the winter and they lasted a hella long time, I skated in them and they proved effective as a skate shoe, it takes a while to get used to how chunky they are but they provide so much comfort, it feels like having pillows on your feet. Overall these are very sick shoes for sneaker heads and skaters alike!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE SHOE DISCOLORED
customer_reviews.text: Shoe cane with a red mark ! I would like a discount or a credit back because they have no more shoes in any style in my size and I feel like they should be discounted or refunded due to the defect !
customer_reviews.author: miles sookoo

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Not even a week old and they crack on the side so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product was used, they were not new as the listing states new. Had to used shoe goo to fix the side of the shoe, Amazon should know better then to send used shoes. When the listing said new. Just be careful. The shoes are nice and they do look and fell like the 2001 release
customer_reviews.author: Darkfuzzy

customer_reviews.title: FITS AS EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair my son has purchased. The first set lasted over a year. He is very happy with his selection and says they are comfortable and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Renata L. Ireland

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with them.
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel like the old d3 2001. Reminds me of my teen years. The product seems to be good quality, original in appearance and the soul of these have very good grip. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: NTerry

customer_reviews.title: Foot Pillows!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Just like the always were! So good I even ordered a pair for my son, and he loves them too! There like pillows for your feet! The shoes deserve 5 stars, but I gave a 4 cause shipping took almost 4 weeks, when estimate was like 3 days! I'm fine with waiting, just don't put people's hopes up!
customer_reviews.author: Bennie G.

customer_reviews.title: best buy yet
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable happy with my buy awesome condition no flaws at all
customer_reviews.author: Huey Gunnz

customer_reviews.title: Not true to the displayed photo. All black.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a different color than shown. All black and no blue. Disappointed because I bought it for the nice blue. Over fits as expected. Right toe is a little tight but will break in over time. Just which it was blue like the photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever made
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes. The only shoes I buy and wear
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. I’ve had these before and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: F 150 owner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for boyfriend bc theyre a throwback to his favorite shoe. True to size and he's in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Cashman

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce
customer_reviews.text: I love the Osiris D3, they are super comfortabl..... if you are considering on buying these shoes, look no more these babies are 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Borrusch

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking skate shoes, a little heavy but super comfortable to wear all day even when your not skating.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne 23

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear supras and these fans a little small
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were great, little snug and there are two parts of the shoes that rub a little much but honestly the look of them and the comfort is amazing. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Fast service and product was as described.  Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked as expected. Few minor scuffs on the side sole. Box was half crushed when pulled out the shipping package. But over all the shoes are great. Did re box them to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Woody

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: These, in my opinion, are the best shoes built for skating. Ive never skated a more durable pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Badass
customer_reviews.text: So glad they brought these back. They’re like hugs for your feet
customer_reviews.author: !ONETEN!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of shoes. Worth the price and ridiculously fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gruwell

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect colors
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is super comfortable but color scheme was nothing close to what was ordered/pictured
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Osiris
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved these shoes. Glad they released them again.
customer_reviews.author: Funnygus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great fit great look reminded me of my early days of skateboarding
customer_reviews.author: Liam Anderson

customer_reviews.title: For relaxing
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is so thick and nice. These are so comfortable. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: W C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit like a gloves and look amazing but the reflective in side part of the shoe had a little scuff mark and the rubber piece on top of the toes was not properly affixed to the shoe witch im sure after time will lift all the way off I may be being to picky but when you pay 109 dollars for shoes you expect top quality
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Blue variant has incorrect pictures. You will receive something different.
customer_reviews.text: Color received is different than the color on the pictures, the black and blue shoes are incorrect.!l if you are looking for that color on the pic, you will not receive that. They are completely back with gray. Some blue areas... quality seems to be poor as well.... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: QBO

product_meta.title: Osiris Men's D3 2001 Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: The shoe that changed everything almost 20 years ago. The D3 2001. Enough said.
feature_bullets: Iconic styling with reinforced high abrasion areas for superior durability
Lightweight padded tongue and collar for added comfort and support
